summary: OpenLitterMap is an open-source project that integrates real-time data collection with gamification to address litter and plastic pollution. The project has a significant global reach, with over 8,200 users in 100+ countries contributing more than 500,000 images. Users earn Littercoin, a digital currency that can be spent with eco-friendly merchants, incentivizing environmental action. The project aims to release a new version, gather feedback, and expand its team significantly.
review: OpenLitterMap presents a compelling case for funding due to its innovative approach to environmental data collection and gamification. The project aligns well with the round's goals of enhancing Web3 accessibility and contributing to social impact. Its global reach and user engagement demonstrate a scalable impact, aligning with the model's emphasis on maximizing utility and systemic change. However, the application lacks detailed information on the deployment of smart contracts and specific plans for the use of grant funds, which are critical for assessing the project's feasibility and alignment with open-source principles.

strengths.title: Global Reach and Impact
strengths.description: OpenLitterMap has a significant global presence, with users in over 100 countries contributing to environmental data collection, demonstrating its scalability and broad impact.

strengths.title: Innovative Gamification Approach
strengths.description: The project uses gamification to incentivize environmental action, aligning with the round's focus on novel utilities and services.

strengths.title: Alignment with Environmental Goals
strengths.description: The project supports environmental sustainability by encouraging users to document and reduce litter, contributing to social impact.

weaknesses.title: Lack of Detailed Financial Plan
weaknesses.description: The application does not provide a detailed breakdown of how the grant funds will be used, which is essential for evaluating the project's feasibility and impact.

weaknesses.title: Insufficient Technical Details
weaknesses.description: There is a lack of information regarding the deployment of smart contracts and technical infrastructure, which is necessary for assessing the project's alignment with open-source and Web3 principles.

changes.title: Provide Detailed Financial Plan
changes.description: Include a comprehensive breakdown of how the grant funds will be allocated to ensure transparency and feasibility.

changes.title: Include Technical Infrastructure Details
changes.description: Provide detailed information on the deployment of smart contracts and technical infrastructure to demonstrate alignment with open-source and Web3 principles.
